name: unnerve
caption: Unnerve

effect.short: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.
effect.full:
Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle.

Affected Pokémon can still use []{move:bug-bite} or []{move:pluck} to eat a target's Berry.

flavorText:
Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable
to eat Berries.
